website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for a solid build and smooth turning crank. Be sure to measure the width of your counter before purchase due to its narrow clamp.
pros: Has a classic design with a clamp base capable of attaching to counters up to 1.5 inches
Cores, slices, and peels a variety of fruits and vegetables
cons: The clamp is a bit narrow and won’t fit all countertops
Some buyers report problems with the blade gouging apples

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Saves time!!
customer_reviews.text: I could not have done what I did today without this thing. It speeds up the process by hours. Definitely worth the money! Do NOT buy the vice version unless you have a butcher block/wood counter/table that is less than 1 1/2-2 inches think. I thought it would work better but with my quartz I had to improvise by using cardboard under it so it wouldn’t scratch and that left it a little loose/wobbly. But that’s my fault...I should have just bought the suction one and I still might. I would have given a 5 star, but the handle kept falling off. There should be a nut on the other side of 2 places to hold pieces in better.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK S.

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money....Buy a Paring knife!
customer_reviews.text: Junk! I have no idea where these good reviews are coming from. The only thing this product can do (and badly at that) is core or spiral cut an apple or potato, but actually peel it....absolutely not. It will gouge, shred or entirely miss the apple leaving you with a mess to clean up and an apple that still requires peeling. Oh, did I mention the parts that rust? A good paring knife or peeler can do the work in half the time with no mess. This is a waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Peels, cores and slices
customer_reviews.text: This crazy contraption saved me a TON of time when a tree full of pears ripened last year. I spread the slices it produced on a baking sheet in the freezer, until they froze, then bagged them in freezer bags. I was able to process so MANY pears that we enjoyed fresh-baked pear tarts, turnovers, compotes and cobblers well into the spring. I would not have bothered to save so many pears without this genius invention.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Teschendorf

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF CRAP

I adjusted every screw I could find, turned every nut, and watched countless YouTubes. It's just a crap peeler, I'd say!

customer_reviews.text: Great apple peeler, if you are precise putting the apple core in the peeler it works great! There is a little learning curve , however, after working with it ,great results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I hate peeling apples. I hate it and refuse to learn to peel them by hand. I just don't have the time or patience to learn. Aggravating my excema on my hands from touching fruit juices is just not worth it. This thing is a time and skin saver. Apples should be of medium size or smaller and as round as possible. Peels and slices as expected.
customer_reviews.author: silkiechicken

customer_reviews.title: Super product.
customer_reviews.text: Greatest product for apple peeling/coring/slicing!!! Purchasing the clamp on version is by far the best because of the stability. We were able to use this device on several different sizes of apples without any problems. Would definitely recommend this product and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: SWest

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I have it clamped at tight as possible and it still slides on the table. And it rusted quickly
customer_reviews.author: Carol R

customer_reviews.title: Old fashioned design that stand test of time
customer_reviews.text: This design has been around since Colonial times and it still is a perfect way to core and peel. You can just peel also if you desire. Sturdy. Just rinse with hot, soapy water and it's ready for next time. Makes peeling apples for kids much easier and they seem to eat more apples if they are already peeled. Great nostalgic color.
customer_reviews.author: FrogsMomma

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this apple peeler!
customer_reviews.text: I like the industrial feel, the little wooden handle is quaint. Easy to peel & core and set up. Perfect tool addition to my kitchen! LOVE THIS THANG!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job Beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Clamped it to the edge of our kitchen counter and peeled/cored a dozen apples in 5 minutes. Absolutely wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: L. D. Smith IITop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: It peels, cores, and slices
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice peeler. It peels, cores, and slices in one step. It is fast and easy, and handles any size apple. Cleanup is also easy. We have three apple trees in our backyard, and many of them used to rot on the ground. But now it is so easy to make a pie or cobbler, that far fewer go to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: I can do about 3 apples a minute thanks to the design.

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first day
customer_reviews.text: This item peeled and cored one apple well, but with only a minor adjustment to the fit on the counter, it broke. Unable use it now. Very disappointed in the poor quality.

customer_reviews.title: Pain to use.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best apple product we have ever gotten!!! We use it everyday and will keep it for as long as we can! It peels and cores really fast and we are got through several baskets of apples in a matter of hours instead of days.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Steele

customer_reviews.title: One tool does it all!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for making pies and other apple dishes. This device peels the apples, cores them and slices. The only thing that would make this better would be easier adjustments. I would definitely recommend this product for easier preparation!

customer_reviews.title: Makes Apple Peeling Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: This makes peeling apples a quick and easy. The only complaint I have is that it's hard to get it clamped well enough that it doesn't slip and twist when I try to use it, so I end up having to hold it in place with one hand. Not a big deal but if I had to do it over again, I'd probably try the suction version.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fleischmann

customer_reviews.title: Works best when apples are fresh
customer_reviews.text: An all metal unit that is as strong as any of this type I have seen. Works best when apples are fresh. Any softness will squeeze the apple until it breaks and will not peel it.
customer_reviews.author: Wi

customer_reviews.title: Love is Johnny Apple Peeler, slicer, corer.
customer_reviews.text: I love this peeler, slicer, corer. It cuts at 1/4 inch and is great for dried apples. Hook it up to our cutting board and away we go. Just takes seconds to process an apple.
customer_reviews.author: Bentli Tate

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good once you figure out how to adjust it. I would have designed it with a little more space at the clamp to handle thicker counter tops. Mine is standard and it just fits. I would have placed a piece of wood or something under the top to prevent scratching of my counter top but there was no room.
customer_reviews.author: JDS Hebron

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: This made my kids love eating apples again! So easy my 3 and 4 year olds can do it. Only downside is I have a hard time getting it tight enough where it doesn’t wiggle while using. Solution is I just have to hold it against the table. Not a big deal considering it now takes 10 seconds to peel and core an apple!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Lane

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I like it fine, but I wish it was a bit heavier gauge metal. It is MUCH better then the cheap one I had before that cost more money. I do a lot of canning and peeling so I really needed a decent peeler. It stood up well with over 50 lbs. of apples and pears.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift for my BFF
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my best friend of over 30 years. She and her husband both said it did everything it was supposed to do in save a good deal of time when it came to making all those apple pies. The didn't know what I paid for it but they said it was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We have had one like this for years. We had given it to one of our children and had to replace it.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty this will last forever
customer_reviews.text: It is very heavy duty, made of cast iron it is a solid piece that will last forever. I was very pleased.
